TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChangeMonitor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class ChangeMonitor Implements IDisposable
public ref class ChangeMonitor abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 为用于监视缓存项所依赖数据的状态更改的派生自定义类型提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for a derived custom type that monitors changes in the state of the data which a cache item depends on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作专用于特定缓存实现的派生监视器类的基类。The class is used as the base class for derived monitor classes that are specialized for particular cache implementations. 实例监视缓存项所依赖的数据的状态更改。A instance monitors changes in the state of data which a cache item depends on. 例如，该项可以是其内容被缓存的文件或数据实体。For example, the item can be a file or data entity whose contents are cached. 如果更新了文件或数据实体，则还必须更改关联的缓存项。If the file or data entity is updated, the associated cache entry must be changed also. 可监视的常见项包括数据实体 (例如数据库字段、值、行或表) 、其他缓存项以及文件和文件属性。Common items that can be monitored include data entities (such as database fields, values, rows, or tables), another cache entry, and files and file attributes. 依赖关系更改是依赖项状态的更改。A dependency change is a change in the state of a dependency. 在典型的缓存实现中，在 实例通知缓存依赖项已更改时，缓存将执行所需的操作，例如使插入的缓存项无效。In a typical cache implementation, after a instance notifies the cache that a dependency has changed, the cache performs the required action, such as invalidating the inserted cache entry. 可以自定义派生类，以监视特定不同数据存储的依赖项更改。Derived classes can be customized to monitor dependency changes for specific different data stores. 例如，文件系统、物理内存或数据库有缓存实现。For example, there are cache implementations for a file system, physical memory, or a database. 类可检查缓存外发生的更改，然后在缓存发生更改时发出警报。The class examines changes that occur outside the cache, and then alerts the cache that changes have occurred. .NET Framework 包括从类派生的以下类 ：The .NET Framework includes the following classes that derive from class: - - - - 其中每个类都适用于不同类型的依赖项。Each of these classes works with different types of dependencies. 例如，派生 类监视缓存项所依赖的文件系统数据 (文件和文件夹) 的缓存更改。For example, the derived class monitors changes to a cache for file system data (files and folders) that the cache item depends on.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 如果创建自定义缓存实现或派生的更改监视器类型，则必须遵循特定的准则。

span.span: If you create a custom cache implementation or a derived change monitor type, you must follow certain guidelines.

para.span: 下面的列表总结了这些准则。

span.span: The following list summarizes these guidelines.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅各个方法或属性的文档。

span.span: For more information, see the documentation for individual methods or properties.

para.span: -派生类的构造函数必须在 方法返回之前设置属性、开始监视和调用 方法。

span.span: - The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call method before the method returns.

para.span: 如果构造函数在构造过程中遇到错误并且必须释放资源，则构造函数只能在 调用方法后调用重载， 因为 如果初始化未完成，重载将引发 异常。

span.span: If a constructor encounters an error during constructions and must have to dispose of resources, the constructor can only call the overload after the method is called because the overload will throw an exception if initialization is not completed.

para.span: -如果在初始化完成之前所监视的数据发生更改，则构造函数必须在 调用方法之前调用方法 。

span.span: - If changes occur in the data that is being monitored before initialization is complete, the constructor must call the method before calling the method.

para.span: - 实例化派生类型后，必须将监视器插入到自定义实现中 。

span.span: - After a derived type is instantiated, you must insert the monitor into a custom implementation.

para.span: 或者，如果使用了更改监视器，请调用 方法。

span.span: Or if you are finished using the change monitor, call the method.

para.span: -在将 实例插入到 实现中后， 实例要求释放更改监视器。

span.span: - After a instance is inserted into a implementation, the instance require that the change monitor is disposed.

para.span: 即使插入无效并引发异常， 实现也必须调用 重载。

span.span: Even if the insertion is invalid and causes an exception, the implementation must call the overload.

para.span: -在将派生的更改监视器插入缓存后， 实现必须 通过传递 对象调用。

span.span: - After a derived change monitor is inserted into a cache, the implementation must call , by passing a object.

para.span: 方法只能调用一次。

span.span: The method can be called only one time.

para.span: 如果已发生依赖项更改，则在 调用时会立即调用该实例 。

span.span: If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called immediately when is called.

para.span: 否则， 将只调用一次实例。

span.span: Otherwise, the instance will be called only one time.

para.span: 当调用方法时，如果实例检测到更改，则会发生这种一次性调用 ，或在 上调用方法时出现这种情况 。

span.span: This one time call occurs either when the method is called because the instance detected a change, or when the method is called on the , whichever occurs first.

para.span: - 由实现提供的实例 应移除关联的缓存项，并使用枚举指定一个原因 。

span.span: - The instance that is provided by an implementation should remove the associated cache entry and specify a reason by using the enumeration.

para.span: -在 缓存实现调用方法之前或之后，实例可以调用方法 。

span.span: - A instance can call the method either before a cache implementation has called method or after.

para.span: 如果在 调用之前调用方法 ，则基 实现将通知缓存此已发生此情况，并将在调用时触发要立即传递给的回调 。

span.span: If the method is called before is called, the base implementation will notify the cache that this has occurred and will trigger the callback to be passed to immediately when is invoked.

para.span: 传递给方法的任何状态数据 均由更改监视器保存，并 在调用方法时传递给方法 。

span.span: Any state data that is passed to the method is saved by the change monitor and subsequently passed to the method when the method is invoked.

para.span: -更改监视器必须实现 方法。

span.span: - A change monitor must implement the method.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 方法文档。

span.span: For more information, see the method documentation.

para.span: - 必须调用方法重载才能释放 实例。

span.span: - The method overload must be called to dispose of the instance.

para.span: 调用 Dispose 的规则如下所示：

span.span: The rules for calling Dispose are as follows:

para.span: -在将某个项插入缓存之前，调用方负责释放 实例。

span.span: - Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the responsibility of caller to dispose of a instance.

para.span: -一旦缓存项及其 关联的实例被传递给缓存，缓存实施者必须确保 调用方法，即使插入操作失败也是如此。

span.span: - Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer must make sure that the method is called, even if the insert fails.

para.span: -将项及其关联的 实例传递给缓存后，调用方不能释放依赖项，因为调用方法时 ，调用将被视为依赖项已更改。

span.span: - After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed.

para.span: 因此， 会自动调用方法。

span.span: As a result, the method is automatically invoked.

para.span: -若要考虑这些规则， 必须通过以下方式之一调用该方法：

span.span: - Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways:

para.span: - 如果用户决定不将派生的更改监视器实例插入到缓存中，则必须调用方法重载。

span.span: - Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache.

para.span: -如果实现尝试将更改监视器实例插入对象缓存但插入失败，则缓存实现将负责调用 重载。

span.span: - If the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails, the cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload.

para.span: 当插入尝试导致异常时，缓存实现必须释放任何关联的依赖项。

span.span: When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose of any associated dependencies.

para.span: -如果缓存项已移除，则缓存实现也必须释放依赖项。

span.span: - If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose of the dependency.

para.span: - 方法在 调用通过注册的回调后，会自动调用方法 。

span.span: - The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through .

para.span: 仅当 之前已完成实例的初始化时，才会在事件激发期间自动调用 dispose 方法。

span.span: This automatic call to the dispose method during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance was previously completed.

para.span: 当派生的更改监视器的构造函数调用 方法时，如果更改监视器的状态已更改 (即，当构造函数仍处于活动状态时，所监视的状态已发生更改) 然后该 方法将自动释放更改监视器。

span.span: When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored already changed when the constructor was still active) then the method will automatically dispose of the change monitor.

para.span: - 当 派生的更改监视器实例调用方法之后，无论是否 已通过调用方法来设置对象，属性都设置为 。

span.span: - The property is set to after the method is called by the derived change-monitor instance, regardless of whether a object has been set by a call to the method or not.
ASP.NET Caching

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从派生类中的构造函数调用此构造函数以初始化基类。

span.span: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有无参数的构造函数。The class has a parameterless constructor. 但是，从基类继承 并定义自定义更改监视行为的类必须在构造函数中执行初始化。However, classes that inherit from the base class and define custom change-monitoring behavior must perform initialization in the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅对继承者的说明部分。For more information, see the Notes for Inheritors section.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数必须设置 属性，开始监视，然后在 返回类之前调用类。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call the class before it returns.

para.span: 如果在初始化完成之前依赖项发生了更改 (例如，如果缓存) 中找不到依赖缓存键，则构造函数必须在调用 方法之前调用方法 。

span.span: If a dependency changes before initialization is complete (for example, if a dependent cache key is not found in the cache), the constructor must call the method before it calls the method.

para.span: 在这种情况下，构造函数只能 在调用方法后调用方法 ，因为 如果初始化未完成，则该方法将引发异常。

span.span: In this case, constructor can call the method only after the method is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于释放 实例和相关资源。The method is used to release the instance and related resources. 调用公共 方法来协调处置过程，使其与派生的更改监视器类 (（如初始化) ）的密钥生命周期事件，并释放实例， 以便可以对实例进行垃圾回收。The public method is invoked to coordinate the disposal process with key life-cycle events of derived change-monitor classes (such as initialization), and to release the instance so that the instance can be garbage collected. 方法由派生的更改监视器类实现，以释放其托管和非托管资源。The method is implemented by derived change-monitor classes to dispose of their managed and unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用方法时，该方法 只调用一次派生类的方法。The method invokes the method of derived classes only one time, the first time it is called. 对方法的后续调用 不起作用。Subsequent calls to the method have no effect. 调用方法后， 属性设置为 `true` 。After the method has been called, the property is set to `true`. 必须调用重载才能释放 实例。The overload must be called to dispose of a instance. 下面是用于调用 dispose 方法的规则：The following are the rules for calling the dispose method: - 在将某个项插入缓存之前，调用方负责释放 实例。Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the caller's responsibility to dispose of a instance. - 缓存项及其关联的 实例被传递到缓存后，必须确保调用的缓存实施者， 即使插入失败也是如此。Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer that must make sure that is called, even if the insert fails. - 将项及其关联的 实例传递给缓存后，调用方不能释放依赖项，因为调用方法时 ，调用将被视为依赖项已更改。After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed. 因此， 会自动调用方法。As a result, the method is automatically invoked. - 考虑这些规则时，必须通过 以下方式之一调用该方法：Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways: - 如果用户决定不将派生的更改监视器实例插入到缓存中，则必须调用方法重载。Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache. - 如果实现尝试将更改监视器实例插入对象缓存但插入失败，则缓存实现负责调用重载。The cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload if the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails. 当插入尝试导致异常时，缓存实现必须释放任何关联的依赖项。When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose any associated dependencies. - 如果删除了该缓存项，则缓存实现也必须释放该依赖项。If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose the dependency. 方法在 调用通过方法注册的回调后，会自动调用方法 。The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through the method. > [!NOTE] > 仅当之前已完成的实例初始化时才会触发事件时的自动释放 。This automatic dispose during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance previously completed. 当派生的更改监视器的构造函数调用 方法时，如果更改监视器的状态已更改 (即，则当构造函数仍处于活动状态时，所监视的状态已更改) then 方法将自动释放更改监视器。When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored has already changed when the constructor was still active) then method will automatically dispose the change monitor. > [!NOTE] > 用户不应调用 方法。Users should not call the method. 但是，您不能阻止用户调用方法。However, you cannot prevent users from calling the method. 因此，如果这样做，将 调用方法。Therefore, if they do, the method is invoked. 在这种情况下，将通知缓存项，就好像依赖项发生了更改。In that case, the cache entry is notified as if the dependency has changed. 若要防止派生类使用重写 方法，该方法不是显式接口实现。To prevent derived classes from overriding method, the method is not an explicit interface implementation.

exception.span: 在调用 基方法的派生更改监视器类中，初始化未完成。

span.span: Initialization is not complete in the derived change-monitor class that called the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，以及对 实例的任何引用，则为 ；若要仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources and any references to a instance; to release only unmanaged resources.

param.span: 传递 时， 方法由 线程调用，所有外部托管引用由于已经作为垃圾回收，因此可能不再有效。

span.span: When is passed, the method is called by a thread and any external managed references are likely no longer valid because they have already been garbage collected.

summary.span: 释放所有托管资源和非托管资源，以及对 实例的任何引用。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources and any references to the instance.

summary.span: 此重载必须由派生的更改监视器类实现。

span.span: This overload must be implemented by derived change-monitor classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 value 的值 `disposing` 为时 `true` ，将释放所有托管资源和非托管资源并释放对此对象的任何引用，以便可以对派生的更改监视器实例进行垃圾回收。When the value of `disposing` value is `true`, all managed and unmanaged resources are disposed and any references to this object are released so that the derived change-monitor instance can be garbage collected. 保证基 方法只调用一次已实现的 方法。It is guaranteed that the base method will invoke the implemented method only one time.

para.span: 当的值为时，更改监视器必须实现重载才能释放所有托管资源和非托管资源 。

span.span: A change monitor must implement the overload to release all managed and unmanaged resources when the value of is .

para.span: 具有 值的方法重载 只调用一次，即首次释放实例时。

span.span: The method overload that has a value of is called only one time, namely, when the instance is disposed for the first time.

para.span: 更改监视器不能 直接调用重载。

span.span: A change monitor must not call the overload directly.

para.span: 派生的更改监视器可以调用基类上不太公共的无参数 方法 。

span.span: A derived change monitor can call the public parameter-less method on the base class.

para.span: 或者，更改监视器可以实现终结器方法。

span.span: Alternatively, a change monitor can implement a finalizer method.

para.span: 在这种情况下，终结器可以调用 方法并向其传递 值 。

span.span: In that case, the finalizer can invoke the method and pass it a value of .

para.span: 但是，这通常是不必要的。

span.span: However, this is usually unnecessary.

para.span: 监视依赖项更改通常由维护对更改监视器实例的引用的服务执行。

span.span: Monitoring for dependency changes is typically performed by a service that maintains a reference to the change-monitor instance.

para.span: 引用阻止对实例进行垃圾回收，因此不需要终结器方法。

span.span: The reference prevents the instance from being garbage collected, and therefore makes a finalizer method unnecessary.

para.span: 若要避免内存泄漏，在依赖项发生更改时， 方法将释放更改监视器实例 (除非初始化尚未完成) 。

span.span: To avoid memory leaks, when a dependency changes, the method disposes the change-monitor instance (unless initialization has not finished).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChanged As Boolean
public: property bool HasChanged { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由 类监视的状态已发生更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the state that is monitored by the class has changed.

value.span: 如果由 实例监视的状态已发生更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the state that is monitored by the instance has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中检查此属性的值 ，以查看依赖项是否已更改。You can check the value of this property in a derived class to see whether a dependency has changed. 当 `true` 依赖项发生更改时，该值将设置为 (即 ) 方法调用时。The value is set to `true` when a dependency change occurs (that is, when the method is called). 派生类调用方法后， `true` 无论是否 已通过调用方法通知实例，属性的值都将为 。After the method is called by the derived class, the value of the property will be `true`, regardless of whether a instance has been notified by a call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 调用方可以检查 属性，以查看依赖项是否已更改。Callers can check the property to see whether a dependency has changed. 但在多线程环境中，更简单、更易于维护的方法是将数据插入缓存实现，而不检查 属性。However, in a multi-threaded environment, a simpler and more maintainable approach is to insert data into a cache implementation without checking the property. 缓存实现必须检查 属性，如果已更改一个或多个关联的依赖项，则不得执行插入或设置操作。Cache implementations must check the property for you and must not perform an insert or set operation if one or more associated dependencies have already changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InitializationComplete() cil managed

summary.span: 从派生类的构造函数进行调用以指示初始化已完成。

span.span: Called from the constructor of derived classes to indicate that initialization is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在派生类中完成初始化之前依赖项发生了更改，则派生类的构造函数必须调用 方法。If a dependency changes before initialization is complete in a derived class, the constructor of the derived class must invoke the method. 调用方法时， 更改监视器会自动将属性设置为 `true` 。When the method is invoked, the property is automatically set to `true` by the change monitor. 因此，当更改监视器的构造函数调用 方法时，基类会自动调用 方法。As a result, when the change monitor's constructor calls the method, the base class will automatically call the method. 如果初始化完成， 方法会自动释放派生的更改监视器实例。If initialization is complete, the method automatically disposes the derived change-monitor instance.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数必须在 构造函数返回前调用基方法。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must call the base method before the constructor returns.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数 只能在调用后调用方法 ，因为 如果初始化未完成，则该方法将引发异常。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class can call the method only after is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDisposed As Boolean
public: property bool IsDisposed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示释放 类的派生实例。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the derived instance of a class is disposed.

value.span: 如果释放该实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is disposed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`当基 方法 在派生类中调用方法以释放实例时，属性设置为。The property is set to `true` after the base method calls the method in a derived class to dispose of the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void NotifyOnChanged(class System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback onChangedCallback) cil managed

param.name: onChangedCallback
param.span: 对在某个依赖项更改时要调用的方法的引用。

span.span: A reference to a method that is invoked when a dependency has changed.

summary.span: 由缓存实施者调用来注册回调，并在某个依赖项已更改时通过 委托通知 实例。

span.span: Called by Cache implementers to register a callback and notify an instance through the delegate when a dependency has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存实施者使用此方法来连接到更改监视器。Cache implementers use this method to wire themselves up to a change monitor. 如果将一个或多个更改监视器与缓存项关联，则会将已 填充的更改监视器属性的实例传递给缓存项。If you associate one or more change monitors with the cache item, you pass a instance with a populated change monitors property to the cache item. 支持更改监视器的缓存实施者负责遍历 属性，并向 其找到的每个更改监视器注册委托。A cache implementer that supports change monitors is responsible for iterating over the property and register the delegates with each change monitor that it finds. 由于 委托包含可选状态参数，因此具体的更改监视器实现可以传递可选状态信息。Because the delegate includes an optional state parameter, a concrete change monitor implementation can pass optional state information. 缓存实施者确定是否可以执行自定义更改监视器作为回调的一部分传递的状态类型的显式依赖项。The cache implementer determines whether an explicit dependency on the type of state that a custom change monitor passes as part of the callback can be taken. > [!NOTE] > 基本缓存扩展性 API 不要求显式依赖于状态类型。The base cache extensibility API has no requirement for explicit dependency on the type of state. 方法的实现 会自动确定在调用时间方法时监视器的状态是否已更改 。The implementation of the method automatically determines whether the state of the monitor has already changed at the time method is called. 如果 属性为 `true` ，则方法将通过方法自动调用 已注册的事件处理程序 。If the property is `true`, then the method automatically calls the event handler, that was registered, through the method. 之所以发生这种情况，是因为在缓存实现创建更改监视器的时间可能会导致缓存实现获得监视器并向其自身进行线路操作，因此，基础监视状态已更改。This occurs because it is possible that from the time a cache implementation creates a change monitor, to the time a cache implementation gets the monitor and wires itself up to it, the underlying monitored state has changed. 如果状态已更改，则传递给该方法的对象 是 `null` 。If the state has already changed then the object that is passed to the method is `null`. 方法只能调用一次，并将在后续调用时引发异常。The method can be invoked only one time, and will throw an exception on subsequent calls.

span.span: The callback method has already been invoked.
is .

para.span: 1. 必须调用 方法以获得任何依赖项更改的通知。

span.span: 1. You must call the method to be notified of any dependency changes.

para.span: 如果已发生依赖项更改，则 调用时将调用该实例 。

span.span: If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called when is called.

para.span: 否则，在 调用方法时或调用方法时（以先发生的为准），将调用实例一次 。

span.span: Otherwise, the instance will be called one time, either when the method is called or when the method is called, whichever occurs first.

para.span: 缓存实现提供的实例应删除缓存项，如果缓存调用方请求，则将必要的更改或更新事件返回给原始缓存调用方。

span.span: The instance provided by the cache implementation should remove the cache entry and if it is requested by the cache caller, raise the necessary change or update event back to the original cache caller.

para.span: 对象缓存实现必须删除与依赖项更改关联的缓存项。

span.span: The object cache implementation must remove the cache entry that is associated with a dependency change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnChanged(object state) cil managed

span.span: The data for the change event.
This value can be .

summary.span: 由派生类调用以在某个依赖项发生更改时引发事件。

span.span: Called by derived classes to raise the event when a dependency changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 在依赖项发生更改时调用方法。Typically, the method is called when dependency changes occur. 当释放更改监视器实例时，也会调用方法，但仅当尚未调用回调时才会进行释放。The method is also invoked when a change-monitor instance is disposed but the disposal occurs only if the callback has not already been invoked. 如果在 调用方法之前调用方法 ，缓存实现将保存对方法的调用中的状态数据 。If the method is called before the method is called, the state data from the call to the method is saved by the cache implementation. 此外，调用方法时，将 立即调用方法的回调 。Also, the callback to the method is invoked immediately when the method is invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个表示 类实例的值。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the class instance.

value.span: 某个更改监视器实例的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for a change-monitor instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常由依赖关系名称组合而成，这些数据可唯一地标识实例所监视的数据 。The property value typically consists of dependency names combined string data that uniquely identifiers the data that is being monitored by a instance. 属性的值 为字符串。The value of the property is a string. 字符串的值用于分配实例的唯一 ID 。The value of the string is used to assign the unique ID of the instance.

para.span: 通过重写属性，可以为属性的字符串值定义自定义实现，以便为其分配唯一 ID。

span.span: By overriding the property, you can define a custom implementation for the string value of the property in order to assign it a unique ID.

para.span: 在派生类中，必须在构造函数中设置属性的值。

span.span: In derived classes, you must set the value of the property in the constructor.
